dos_and_donts: If the customer wants to 'lose weight', don't give out product recommendations, tell them to consult with a healthcare provider
Don't recommend any products to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease
drive_to_purchase: Refer the customer to Amazon if the product is not available on the website but in-stock there
promo_and_exclusions: Codes can NOT be applied to subscription orders
welcome/rewards codes cannot be applied to seasonal at the moment

send_to_cs: Send to CS If product recommendation convos are taking too long
escalate: ESC if cx ask to speak to a rep/sales associate from Newstore SMS (this is their clienteling service)
When a customer asks to be unsubscribed of emails too, use UFE shortcut and ESC after
For any inquiries about local stores/ in-store shopping, use SI shortcut and ESC with this escalation note:
tone: Don't reply and close the convo if the customer replies "no, okay, no thank you or similar ".
Let the customer have the last word
templates: For cx's who haven't made a purchase before and are looking for free shipping, use NFS shortcut
dos_and_donts: There is a scam website using UNTUCKit products, educate cx if they encounter one and redirect to our website
drive_to_purchase: Send the customer who's looking to get a fit to our virtual fitter "Find your fit"
If a cx is looking to get something, send a catalogue of offers first, unless they're looking to get something specific
When sending the SZ template educate the cx about styles that are appropriate for them
